document.full_text: top congressional republicans said on sunday they would be open to a compromise on healthcare costs, one of the biggest stumbling blocks in a deal to get the united states' debt under control.
document.title: republicans suggest deal possible on healthcare
lines_and_colors: top congressional republicans said on sunday they would be open to a compromise on healthcare costs, one of the biggest stumbling blocks in a deal to get the united states' debt under control.
